Meta.title: Reforged Equipment
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod添加了三个配方, 让你可以在[枪身加工机]上, 使用[研磨剂], 重新随机装备属性 所有属性只会在比处理前的值更高时才会实际应用, 并且会分别处理每一条属性 (当前版本[砂轮机]的配方似乎有BUG会吞掉抛光物品,所以这里使用[枪身加工机],我不太确定正常抛光会不会吞物品,有人能试一下吗?) 同时提供了一个BepInEx配置文件 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.grindingwheelreforgedequipment.cfg") 允许你设置: 一次校准即可达到最大值
注意: 这个mod不会考虑轻量化卷轴导致的伤害与命中, 轻量化会彻底改变基础值, 且不记录次数
This mod adds three recipes, allowing you to use [polishing powder] on the [barrel processing machine] to reroll the equipment's attributes. Each attribute will only be applied if it is higher than its previous value, and each attribute is processed individually. (Currently, the [grinding whell] recipe seems to have a bug that consumes the polished item, so we use the [barrel processing machine] instead. I'm not sure if normal polishing will consume the item. Can someone test it?) It also provides a BepInEx configuration file (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.grindingwheelreforgedequipment.cfg") that allows you to set: One-time calibration reaches maximum value.
Note: This mod does not account for the damage and hit changes caused by lightweight scrolls. Lightweight scrolls will completely alter the base values and do not track the number of uses.
